name: Birthday on the dreams
description:
This is visual novel adventure game 

The protagonist wake up into the dreams world

Futaba kirikane is female protagonist she was born from rape she don't know her birthday she find her step brother with her friend ash stickmin

This game based on my own childhood story 

This game is really short and unfinished I'm sorry i trying to my best 

More features:

-all 5 chapters

-more characters and cgs

-chapter 3-4 we have doraemon and symphogear collab (not officially characters i we make a original character)

-no endings in chapter 3-4 we have a random 

-more storyline in this game

Program: kocho - visual novel maker

This game is not completely
